pkgmetadata.longdescription:
pipfile-sort

Sort package dependency lists in Pipfile.

## Install```shellpip install pipfile-sort```## Usage```shell# Pipfile-sort targets Pipfile on current directory,# so need to move to the directory where Pipfile exists.cd /path/to/pipfile/dir# Rewrite Pipfile as the package lists are sorted.pipfile-sort```
